sn36.6:1.3: adhippayāso → adhippāyo (bj, mr); adhippāyaso (sya-all, km); adhippāyoso (pts-vp-pli1ed)
sn36.6:1.8: sallena vijjheyya → sallena vijjheyyuṃ (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed)
sn36.6:1.9: sallena anuvedhaṃ vijjheyya → sallena anuvedhaṃ vijjheyyuṃ (bj, sya-all, km); sallena vijjheyyuṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
